(Simplified: 癣)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 鮮 indicates the sound; 疒 (sickness) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 疒 [ nè ] sickness, disease
    • 鮮 [ xiān ] fresh; delicious; attractive
①由黴菌引起的某些皮膚病的統稱，患處常發癢：癬疥。頭癬。手癬。體癬。足癬。

癬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuǎn］
［《廣韻》息淺切，上獮，心。］
亦作“1”。“癣1”的繁体字。
皮肤感染霉菌后引起的一种疾病。

癬字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癬； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页783第04
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】息淺切【正韻】蘇典切，?音?。【說文】乾瘍也。【釋名】癬，徙也。移徙處自廣也，故靑徐謂癬爲徙也。【左傳·桓六年】謂其不疾瘯蠡也。【註】皮毛無疥癬。　又【集韻】相然切，音僊。義同。　或作?。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuǎn］
["Guangyun" breath is shallow and cut, upright, heart. ]
Also known as "1". Traditional characters for "tinea 1".
A disease caused by mold infection on the skin.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Part of Sui Characters] 　 Ringworm; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 783 04
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】Xia Qiqi 【Zheng Yun】Su Dianqie, "Yin". [Said the text] Dry sores are also. [Release name] Ringworm, migration also. Migration is also from Guangxi, so Tianxu said that ringworm is a migration. [Zuo Zhuan·Huan 6 years] It is said that it is not ill. [Note] No scabies on the fur.　[Jiyun] It’s the same, the sound is immortal. The same meaning.　Or make?.
